category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEReportColumnWidthForProcessSimulate
preference.preference_description: Specifies the widths for the columns displayed in the report for failed checkout objects in the Process Simulate Check-Out menu command, as defined in the MEReportColumnsForProcessSimulate preference. Valid Values: Accepts integer values. The number of integers must match the number of columns described in the MEReportColumnsForProcessSimulate preference.
